PUBLIC.RESOURCE.ORG ~ A Nonprofit Corporation  
Public Works for a Better Government  The Public Resource logo. A smiling seal with a red embossed seal around it that reads "The Great Seal of the Seal of Approval" and "Public.Resource.Org"
May 3, 2018 
Public.Resource.Org Receives 3-Year Grant From Arcadia 
Public.Resource.Org (“Public Resource”) is pleased to announce that it has received a grant 
of US$1.5 million from Arcadia, a charitable fund of Lisbet Rausing and Peter Baldwin, in 
support
